did.unittitle: Ceylon Infant School Society of Philadelphia records

bioghist.p: The Ceylon Infant School Society of Philadelphia was formed in 1834, for the purpose of supporting and promoting Infant Schools in Ceylon.

scopecontent.p: This is a volume of minutes and related records, 1834-1843, of the Ceylon Infant School. The volume records quarterly and special meetings of the Society and includes Articles of Incorporation and occasional summaries of addresses to the members. The collection also includes two photographs (most likely not of members of the Society as the photographs appear to be from the late 19th or early 20th century).
